content:
Hi everyone,

Because of compatibility with different implementations of code for DSTU2 and DSTU3, we need to use hapi-fhir-base 2.3 and hapi-fhir-base 3.0 in the same project. Initially we haven't encountered any errors. Is there the possibility of eventual inconsistencies?
You might want to check out the Versioned API track and the connectathon to see what we've been thinking regarding how to handle consuming more than one version of FHIR at a time.
there's no issue doing this with HAPI

Thank you @Kevin Olbrich and @Grahame Grieve. We'll be considering working with just one version at a time (we'll be testing 3.3 for the next few days), but I'll definitely check what you suggested, Kevin
